ygData.subject: Re: Mask of Deception vs Ultravision update
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey, I responded.  Wood elf, new mask, I get UV.  The only time I ve had it go away is due to the already mentioned problem with Psalm of Warmth/Cooling.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 2 Feb 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> So far everyone who has responded to my initial post (4 or 5 replies) has
> been a half elf. It seems that half elves have no problem and get
> ultravision when they activate the DE illusion. So far no wood elf with a
> Mask has responded. So if you are a wood elf with the Mask of Deception
> please let me know if you are able to get ultravision when you activate the
> illusion.

Hey, I responded. Wood elf, new mask, I get UV. The only
time I've had it go away is due to the already mentioned
problem with Psalm of Warmth/Cooling.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
